task: Parse an AWS S3 bucket name from an S3 URI string (e.g., 's3://my-bucket/path/to/file.txt')
Create a CloudFormation template JSON object that defines a basic EC2 security group allowing HTTP and HTTPS traffic
Write a Python function that takes an AWS IAM ARN string and returns the service name (e.g., 'iam', 's3', 'lambda')
